thread.title: The Internet is Freaking out, and It's All Thanks to the Man Choker
thread.title_full: The Internet is Freaking out, and It's All Thanks to the Man Choker

title: The Internet is Freaking out, and It's All Thanks to the Man Choker
text:
The Internet is Freaking out, and It's All Thanks to the Man Choker By Brittany Joyce | January 4, 2017 | 2:33pm Share Tweet Submit Pin 
New year, new… things? While 2016 saw the rise, and fall, of chokers, 2017 has already put a twist on the 90s staple. Introducing the man choker. What has made quite the stir since its recent introduction on ASOS, no one quite seems to know what’s happening. GQ wants to put a stop to it now , and this morning, Matt Lauer unbuttoned his shirt to reveal one on the Today show, saying , “They’re late to the game. Because guys, I have been wearing a choker for years. I’m not kidding. For years.” Whatever’s going on, at least the year’s kicking off with a laugh. But if you’re, um, into it, ASOS is offering them in velvet, suede, leather and metal. While we’re not quite sure what differentiates a women’s choker from a man’s, you can take a look for yourself here .
